meanings.def: unwilling to work or be active; doing as little as possible
examples: He was not stupid, just lazy.
too lazy to do something I was feeling too lazy to go out.

meanings.def: not involving much energy or activity; slow and relaxed
examples: We spent a lazy day on the beach.
His smile was slow, almost lazy.

meanings.def: showing a lack of effort or care
examples: Most of us are intellectually lazy about large areas of the world around us.
We thought we were winning, so we got lazy.
